channel.title: SourceForge kills!
channel.description:
Ok, lets analize this:
Situation: SRL, great community, good scripters and a team of the best developers. Event: Fakawi, the leader leaves. Consequence: SRL moves, dies.
C the picture? Thats not good.
Now...
Situation: SRL, team of the best developers, sourceforge project. Problem: SourceForge is opensource, everyone can get the dev version, development slows down/stops. Consequence: SRL dies.
Hmm, fits right into the first pic, between moves and dies...
I say we have a problem, we can't go on with sourceforge, it's not made for this project!
Solution: Our own private SVN, no sourceforge.
This gives us another problem... We can't run an svn 24/7.
Well, I see only 1 solution...
An SVN hosting service.
Now, everyone knows there are webhosts, you can host ur website, everybody happy, now there are webhosts who rpovide a good, free hosting package.
=> thinking => If the are free webhosts => then there must be free SVN hosts!
Now, svn host, even payed ones aren't very common, because of sites like sourceforge...
I looked a bit and so far i only found one free host that doesn't need ur project to be language specific: https://opensvn.csie.org/
This might be the solution! Plz comment, thx.
[PS: I'm not saying this is the only problem...]

item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100

@Starblaster100 wrote:

Ya didn’t realise SourceForge was open source. Sorry :S

item.title: SourceForge kills!
item.dc:creator: @Wizzup Wizzup?
item.description:
@Wizzup wrote:

I am against open source, sorry, but everyone who can access the SvN has now taken the private autoresponder…

EDIT : Autoresponder is out, still… I don’t like the idea…
And Mopar : I checked the voting topic’s, and quite some votes are cast!

Read full topic

item.title: SourceForge kills!
item.dc:creator: @realrune realrune
item.description:
@realrune wrote:

Dankness:

Im still tryin to figure out what to do honestly, my time is quite ilimited at the moment, I can still be a good leader and make the proper decisions to keep SRL running but i will not be able to release scripts like Fawaki did to keep the community intersted until Winter… But belive me when my next script is released Fawaki would be proud to say the least Its about 80% done now, Draynor Chop-All, Smelt-All in one script But neways we need to setup another Poll will the 4 or 5 most voted for people in that and narrow our choices down until its done its the democratic method of doing things.

Hmm, i’m making a script like that too for draynor, except mine mines(coal, mith, addy), smelts(steel, mith, addy), fishes(nets, and lures), and cuts(willows). It’s prolly gonna be pay though, it’s already 2.5k lines. It’s basically done except i need to make the walking to and from furnace 100% and touch up the forms.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:2, topic:6600”][quote author=Freddy1990 link=topic=9059.msg98772#msg98772 date=1154106764]
[PS: I’m not saying this is the only problem…]
[/quote]

imho, sourceforge is not the problem at all, its the fact that fawkawi left and we havent chose a leader yet, I tried to get us to choose a leader, but then it got locked and still absolutley nothing has been done.[/quote]
I agree that the fact that we haven’t chosen a leader yet is part of the problem, but this is 2.
EDIT: Well, 20 people voted, so it seems pretty clear that it’s gonna be Darkness vs Wizzup…

moparisthebest:

[offtopic]I think you are the only one against it being open source :P[/offtopic]

I’m sure i’m not the only one
